subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After sitting out in 12 of the Nets’ previous 19 games, Antoine Wright started and played 35 minutes against the Nuggets, scored 11 points and played excellent defense against Carmelo Anthony.
snippet: After sitting out in 12 of the Nets’ previous 19 games, Antoine Wright started and played 35 minutes against the Nuggets, scored 11 points and played excellent defense against Carmelo Anthony.
